name: Operator (itch) (Darylsteak)
description:
Fullscreen mode recommended

Story:
Studying as a university student, you have been granted a 5 day internship at a local nuclear powerplant!

The problem? They've clearly been cutting corners.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, Operator features too many things to do, a not in the best condition nuclear power plant, and not enough power sockets to run everything at the same time. Can you survive the 5 day internship? Probably, but you never know.

If you get stuck:

- Note that most stuff is drag and drop, the entire game is played using mouse

- Drag off the top of the screen is basically just dragging it up, and up, until something happens

- Plug looking things go into the socket looking things.

- If you put the card in and power is hooked up but nothing is happening, press the button.

-Soft locked or cannot proceed? Press SPACE to autocomplete the level.

- Still stuck? Comment below and ill get back to you soon as can be.
